an4.4:1.1: “Catusu, bhikkhave, miccha patipajjamano balo abyatto asappuriso khatam upahatam attanam pariharati savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an4.4:1.3: Matari, bhikkhave, miccha patipajjamano balo abyatto asappuriso khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an4.4:1.4: Pitari, bhikkhave, miccha patipajjamano …pe… tathagate, bhikkhave, miccha patipajjamano …pe… tathagatasavake, bhikkhave, miccha patipajjamano balo abyatto asappuriso khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an4.4:1.5: Imesu kho, bhikkhave, catusu miccha patipajjamano balo abyatto asappuriso khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an4.4:2.1: Catusu, bhikkhave, samma patipajjamano pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca punnam pasavati.
an4.4:2.3: Matari, bhikkhave, samma patipajjamano pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca punnam pasavati.
an4.4:2.4: Pitari, bhikkhave, samma patipajjamano …pe… tathagate, bhikkhave, samma patipajjamano …pe… tathagatasavake, bhikkhave, samma patipajjamano pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca punnam pasavati.
an4.4:2.5: Imesu kho, bhikkhave, catusu samma patipajjamano pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca punnam pasavatiti.
